00046 #define PIZ_SLOT_VERSION        0
00047 #define PIZ_SLOT_GRID           1
00048 #define PIZ_SLOT_NOTE_VALUE     2
00049 #define PIZ_SLOT_START          3
00050 #define PIZ_SLOT_END            4
00051 #define PIZ_SLOT_DOWN           5
00052 #define PIZ_SLOT_UP             6
00053 #define PIZ_SLOT_COUNT          7
00054 #define PIZ_SLOT_DATA           8
00055 
00056 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 
00059 static long piz_start        = PIZ_DEFAULT_START;
00060 static long piz_end          = PIZ_DEFAULT_END;
00061 static long piz_down         = PIZ_DEFAULT_DOWN;
00062 static long piz_up           = PIZ_DEFAULT_UP;
00063 static long piz_originStart  = PIZ_DEFAULT_START;
00064 static long piz_originDown   = PIZ_DEFAULT_DOWN;
00065 static long piz_originWidth  = PIZ_DEFAULT_END - PIZ_DEFAULT_START;
00066 static long piz_originHeight = PIZ_DEFAULT_UP  - PIZ_DEFAULT_DOWN;
00067

00069 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 #pragma mark -
00071 
00072 void pizSequenceInitTempZone (PIZSequence *x)
00073 {
00074     PIZLOCK
00075     
00076     piz_start         = x->start;
00077     piz_end           = x->end;
00078     piz_down          = x->down;
00079     piz_up            = x->up;
00080     piz_originStart   = x->start;
00081     piz_originDown    = x->down;
00082     piz_originWidth   = x->end - x->start;
00083     piz_originHeight  = x->up  - x->down;
00084     
00085     PIZUNLOCK
00086 }
00087 
00088 PIZError pizSequencePutTempZone (PIZSequence *x)
00089 {
00090     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00091     
00092     PIZLOCK
00093     
00094     if (!(piz_start == piz_end)) {
00095     
00096         if (piz_end < piz_start) {
00097             long k    = piz_end;
00098             piz_end   = piz_start;
00099             piz_start = k;
00100         }
00101         
00102         if (piz_up < piz_down) {
00103             long k   = piz_up;
00104             piz_up   = piz_down;
00105             piz_down = k;
00106         }
00107         
00108         x->start = piz_start;
00109         x->end   = piz_end;
00110         x->down  = piz_down;
00111         x->up    = piz_up;
00112         
00113         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00114     }
00115         
00116     PIZUNLOCK
00117     
00118     return err;
00119 }
00120 
00121 bool pizSequenceResizeTempZone (PIZSequence *x, const PIZCoordinates *c, PIZDataIndex side)
00122 {
00123     long temp;
00124     bool haveChanged = false;
00125     
00126     PIZLOCK
00127     
00128     switch (side) {
00129     case PIZ_DATA_START : temp = CLAMP (pizSequenceSnapRound (x, c->position), 0, PIZ_SEQUENCE_TIMELINE_SIZE);
00130                           if (piz_start != temp) { 
00131                           piz_start = temp; haveChanged = true; 
00132                           } break;
00133     case PIZ_DATA_END   : temp = CLAMP (pizSequenceSnapRound (x, c->position), 0, PIZ_SEQUENCE_TIMELINE_SIZE); 
00134                           if (piz_end != temp) { 
00135                           piz_end = temp; haveChanged = true; 
00136                           } break;
00137     case PIZ_DATA_DOWN  : if (c->pitch <= piz_up) { 
00138                           temp = CLAMP (c->pitch, 0, PIZ_MAGIC_PITCH); 
00139                           } 
00140                           if (piz_down != temp) { 
00141                           piz_down = temp; haveChanged = true; 
00142                           } break;
00143     case PIZ_DATA_UP    : if (c->pitch >= piz_down) { 
00144                           temp = CLAMP (c->pitch, 0, PIZ_MAGIC_PITCH); 
00145                           } 
00146                           if (piz_up != temp) { 
00147                           piz_up = temp; haveChanged = true; 
00148                           } break;
00149     }
00150     
00151     PIZUNLOCK
00152     
00153     return haveChanged;
00154 }
00155 
00156 bool pizSequenceMoveTempZone (PIZSequence *x, long pitch, long position)
00157 {
00158     bool haveChanged = false;
00159     long tempStart, tempDown;
00160     
00161     PIZLOCK
00162     
00163     tempStart = pizSequenceSnapRound (x, piz_originStart + position);
00164     tempStart = CLAMP (tempStart, 0, (PIZ_SEQUENCE_TIMELINE_SIZE - piz_originWidth));
00165     tempDown  = CLAMP (piz_originDown + pitch, 0, (PIZ_MAGIC_PITCH - piz_originHeight));
00166     
00167     if ((tempStart != piz_start) || (tempDown != piz_down)) {
00168         piz_start = tempStart;
00169         piz_end   = tempStart + piz_originWidth;
00170         piz_down  = tempDown;
00171         piz_up    = tempDown + piz_originHeight;
00172         
00173         haveChanged = true;
00174     }
00175     
00176     PIZUNLOCK
00177     
00178     return haveChanged;
00179 }
00180

00183 #pragma mark -
00184 
00185 PIZError pizSequenceTempZoneToArray (PIZSequence *x, PIZGrowingArray *a)
00186 {
00187     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00188 
00189     PIZLOCK
00190     
00191     if (a) {
00192         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00193         
00194         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, piz_start);
00195         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, piz_end);
00196         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, piz_down);
00197         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, piz_up);
00198     }
00199         
00200     PIZUNLOCK
00201     
00202     return err;
00203 }

00209 void pizSequenceSelectAllNotes (PIZSequence *x)
00210 {
00211     long i;
00212     
00213     PIZLOCK
00214     
00215     for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {   
00216         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00217         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00218         
00219         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00220         
00221         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00222         
00223         while (note) {
00224             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00225             note->isSelected = true;
00226             note = nextNote;
00227         }
00228     }
00229     
00230     PIZUNLOCK
00231 }
00232 
00233 void pizSequenceUnselectAllNotes (PIZSequence *x)
00234 {
00235     PIZLOCK
00236     
00237     pizSequenceUnselectNotes (x);
00238     
00239     PIZUNLOCK
00240 }
00241 
00242 long pizSequenceSelectNoteWithCoordinates (PIZSequence *x, const PIZCoordinates *c)
00243 {
00244     long i, count;
00245     long k = 0;
00246 
00247     PIZLOCK
00248     
00249     count = pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map);
00250         
00251     for (i = (count - 1); i >= 0; i--) {
00252         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00253         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00254         
00255         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00256         
00257         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00258         
00259         while (note && !k) {
00260             long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00261             
00262             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00263             
00264             err |= (c->position < p);
00265             err |= (c->position > (p + note->data[PIZ_DURATION]));
00266             err |= (c->pitch != note->data[PIZ_PITCH]);
00267             
00268             if (!err) {
00269             
00270                 if (!note->isSelected) {
00271                     pizSequenceUnselectNotes (x);
00272                     note->isSelected = true;
00273                     x->markedNote = note;
00274                 }
00275                 
00276                 k = 1;
00277             }
00278             
00279             note = nextNote;
00280         }
00281         
00282         if (k) { 
00283             break;
00284         }
00285     }
00286     
00287     PIZUNLOCK
00288     
00289     return k;
00290 }
00291 
00292 long pizSequenceInvertNoteWithCoordinates (PIZSequence *x, const PIZCoordinates *c)
00293 {
00294     long i, count;
00295     long k = -1;
00296     
00297     PIZLOCK
00298     
00299     count = pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map);
00300         
00301     for (i = (count - 1); i >= 0; i--) {
00302         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00303         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00304         
00305         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00306         
00307         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00308         
00309         while (note) {
00310             long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00311             
00312             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00313             
00314             err |= (c->position < p);
00315             err |= (c->position > (p + note->data[PIZ_DURATION]));
00316             err |= (c->pitch != note->data[PIZ_PITCH]);
00317             
00318             if (!err) {
00319                 if (note->isSelected) {
00320                     if (x->markedNote == note) {
00321                         x->markedNote = NULL;
00322                     }
00323                             
00324                     note->isSelected = false;
00325                     k = 0;
00326                 } else {
00327                     note->isSelected = true;
00328                     k = 1;
00329                 }
00330                 
00331                 break;
00332             }
00333             
00334             note = nextNote;
00335         }
00336         
00337         if (k != -1) {
00338             break;
00339         }
00340     }
00341     
00342     PIZUNLOCK
00343     
00344     return k;
00345 }

00349 #pragma mark -
00350 
00351 void pizSequenceInitLasso (PIZSequence *x)
00352 {
00353     long i;
00354     
00355     PIZLOCK
00356     
00357     for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {   
00358         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00359         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00360         
00361         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00362         
00363         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00364         
00365         while (note) {
00366             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00367             note->flags &= ~PIZ_NOTE_FLAG_LASSO;
00368             note = nextNote;
00369         }
00370     }
00371     
00372     PIZUNLOCK
00373 }
00374 
00375 long pizSequenceDragLasso (PIZSequence *x, const PIZCoordinates *m, const PIZCoordinates *n, bool reverse)
00376 {
00377     long i, a, b, u, v;
00378     long k = 0;
00379     
00380     PIZLOCK
00381     
00382     a = MIN (m->position,  n->position);
00383     b = MIN (m->pitch,     n->pitch);
00384     u = MAX (m->position,  n->position);
00385     v = MAX (m->pitch,     n->pitch);
00386     
00387     for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {
00388         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00389         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00390         
00391         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00392         
00393         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00394         
00395         while (note) {
00396             long err, end;
00397             
00398             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00399             
00400             err = PIZ_GOOD;
00401             end = p + note->data[PIZ_DURATION];
00402             
00403             err |= !(note->data[PIZ_PITCH] >= b && note->data[PIZ_PITCH] <= v);
00404             err |= !((p >= a && p <= u) || ((end >= a) && (end <= u)));
00405                 
00406             if (!err) {
00407                 if (reverse) {
00408                     if (!(note->flags & PIZ_NOTE_FLAG_LASSO)) {
00409                         note->isSelected = !note->isSelected;
00410                         note->flags |= PIZ_NOTE_FLAG_LASSO;
00411                         k = 1;
00412                             
00413                         if (note == x->markedNote) {
00414                             x->markedNote = NULL;
00415                         }
00416                     }
00417                 } else if (!note->isSelected) {
00418                     note->isSelected = true;
00419                     k = 1;
00420                 }
00421             } else {
00422                 if (reverse) {
00423                     if (note->flags & PIZ_NOTE_FLAG_LASSO) {
00424                         note->isSelected = !note->isSelected;
00425                         note->flags &= ~PIZ_NOTE_FLAG_LASSO;
00426                         k = 1;
00427                     }
00428                 } else if (note->isSelected)  {
00429                     note->isSelected = false;
00430                     k = 1;
00431                 }
00432             }
00433             
00434             note = nextNote;
00435         }
00436     }
00437 
00438     PIZUNLOCK
00439     
00440     return k;
00441 }
00442 
00443 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00444 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00445 #pragma mark -
00446 
00447 PIZError pizSequenceRemoveSelectedNotes (PIZSequence *x)
00448 {
00449     bool haveChanged = false;
00450     long i, err = PIZ_GOOD;
00451     
00452     PIZLOCK
00453     
00454     for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {   
00455         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00456         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00457         
00458         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00459         
00460         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00461         
00462         while (note) {
00463             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00464             
00465             if (note->isSelected) {
00466                 err |= pizSequenceRemoveNote (x, note);
00467                 haveChanged = true;
00468             }
00469                 
00470             note = nextNote;
00471         }
00472     }
00473     
00474     if (haveChanged) {
00475         pizSequenceMakeMap (x);
00476     }
00477     
00478     PIZUNLOCK
00479     
00480     return err; 
00481 }
00482 
00483 PIZError pizSequenceAddNoteWithCoordinates (PIZSequence *x, const PIZCoordinates *c, long flags)
00484 {
00485     long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00486     long values[PIZ_DATA_NOTE_SIZE];
00487     
00488     PIZLOCK
00489         
00490     values[PIZ_DATA_POSITION]    = c->position;
00491     values[PIZ_DATA_PITCH]       = c->pitch;
00492     values[PIZ_DATA_VELOCITY]    = PIZ_DEFAULT_VELOCITY;
00493     values[PIZ_DATA_CHANNEL]     = PIZ_CHANNEL_NONE;
00494     values[PIZ_DATA_IS_SELECTED] = true;
00495     values[PIZ_DATA_IS_MARKED]   = true;
00496 
00497     if (x->noteValue != PIZ_NOTE_NONE) {
00498         values[PIZ_DATA_DURATION] = x->noteValue;
00499     } else {
00500         values[PIZ_DATA_DURATION] = x->grid;
00501     }
00502     
00503     if (!(pizSequenceAddNote (x, values, flags))) {
00504         err |= PIZ_ERROR;
00505     } else {
00506         pizSequenceMakeMap (x);
00507     }
00508                     
00509     PIZUNLOCK
00510     
00511     return err;
00512 }
00513 
00514 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00515 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00516 
00517 PIZError pizSequenceEncodeToArray (PIZSequence *x, PIZGrowingArray *a)
00518 {
00519     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00520     
00521     PIZLOCK
00522     
00523     if (a) {
00524         long i;
00525         
00526         err  = PIZ_GOOD;
00527         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, PIZ_SEQUENCE_VERSION_MAJOR);
00528         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, x->grid);
00529         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, x->noteValue);
00530         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, x->start);
00531         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, x->end);
00532         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, x->down);
00533         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, x->up);
00534         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, x->count);
00535         
00536         for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {   
00537             PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00538             PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00539             
00540             long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00541             
00542             pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00543             
00544             while (note) {
00545                 pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00546                 
00547                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, note->position);
00548                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, note->data[PIZ_PITCH]);
00549                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, note->data[PIZ_VELOCITY]);
00550                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, note->data[PIZ_DURATION]);
00551                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, note->data[PIZ_CHANNEL]);
00552                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, note->isSelected);
00553                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (a, (note == x->markedNote));
00554                 
00555                 note = nextNote;
00556             }
00557         }
00558     }
00559     
00560     PIZUNLOCK
00561     
00562     return err;
00563 }
00564 
00565 PIZError pizSequenceDecodeWithArray (PIZSequence *x, const PIZGrowingArray *a)
00566 {
00567     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00568     
00569     PIZLOCK
00570     
00571     if (a) {
00572         long i, t;
00573         
00574         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00575         pizSequenceRemoveAllNotes (x);
00576 
00577         if (t = pizGrowingArrayCount (a)) {
00578             long k, version, count, grid, noteValue;
00579             long modeFlags = PIZ_ADD_FLAG_UNSELECT;
00580             long *ptr = pizGrowingArrayPtr (a);
00581             
00582             version     = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_VERSION);
00583             grid        = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_GRID);
00584             noteValue   = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_NOTE_VALUE);
00585             
00586             switch (grid) {
00587             case PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_DOTTED          : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_DOTTED);          break;
00588             case PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE                 : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE);                 break;
00589             case PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_TRIPLET         : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_TRIPLET);         break;
00590             case PIZ_HALF_NOTE_DOTTED           : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_HALF_NOTE_DOTTED);           break;
00591             case PIZ_HALF_NOTE                  : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_HALF_NOTE);                  break;
00592             case PIZ_HALF_NOTE_TRIPLET          : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_HALF_NOTE_TRIPLET);          break;
00593             case PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_DOTTED        : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_DOTTED);        break;
00594             case PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE               : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE);               break;
00595             case PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_TRIPLET       : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_TRIPLET);       break;
00596             case PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_DOTTED         : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_DOTTED);         break;
00597             case PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE                : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE);                break;
00598             case PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_TRIPLET        : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_TRIPLET);        break;
00599             case PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_DOTTED      : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_DOTTED);      break;
00600             case PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE             : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE);             break;
00601             case PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_TRIPLET     : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_TRIPLET);     break;
00602             case PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE         : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE);         break;
00603             case PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE_TRIPLET : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE_TRIPLET); break;
00604             case PIZ_NOTE_NONE                  : x->cell = (x->grid = PIZ_NOTE_NONE);                  break;
00605             }
00606             
00607             switch (noteValue) {
00608             case PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_DOTTED          : x->noteValue = PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_DOTTED;             break;
00609             case PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE                 : x->noteValue = PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE;                    break;
00610             case PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_TRIPLET         : x->noteValue = PIZ_WHOLE_NOTE_TRIPLET;            break;
00611             case PIZ_HALF_NOTE_DOTTED           : x->noteValue = PIZ_HALF_NOTE_DOTTED;              break;
00612             case PIZ_HALF_NOTE                  : x->noteValue = PIZ_HALF_NOTE;                     break;
00613             case PIZ_HALF_NOTE_TRIPLET          : x->noteValue = PIZ_HALF_NOTE_TRIPLET;             break;
00614             case PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_DOTTED        : x->noteValue = PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_DOTTED;           break;
00615             case PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE               : x->noteValue = PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE;                  break;
00616             case PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_TRIPLET       : x->noteValue = PIZ_QUARTER_NOTE_TRIPLET;          break;
00617             case PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_DOTTED         : x->noteValue = PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_DOTTED;            break;
00618             case PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE                : x->noteValue = PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE;                   break;
00619             case PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_TRIPLET        : x->noteValue = PIZ_EIGHTH_NOTE_TRIPLET;           break;
00620             case PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_DOTTED      : x->noteValue = PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_DOTTED;         break;
00621             case PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE             : x->noteValue = PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE;                break;
00622             case PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_TRIPLET     : x->noteValue = PIZ_SIXTEENTH_NOTE_TRIPLET;        break;
00623             case PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE         : x->noteValue = PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE;            break;
00624             case PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE_TRIPLET : x->noteValue = PIZ_THIRTY_SECOND_NOTE_TRIPLET;    break;
00625             case PIZ_NOTE_NONE                  : x->noteValue = PIZ_NOTE_NONE;                     break;
00626             }
00627 
00628             x->start    = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_START);
00629             x->end      = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_END);
00630             x->down     = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_DOWN);
00631             x->up       = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_UP);
00632             count       = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_SLOT_COUNT);
00633             
00634             k = PIZ_SLOT_DATA;
00635             
00636             for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00637                 if (!(pizSequenceAddNote (x, ptr + (i * PIZ_DATA_NOTE_SIZE) + k, modeFlags))) {
00638                     err |= PIZ_ERROR;
00639                 }
00640             }
00641             
00642             if (count) {
00643                 pizSequenceMakeMap (x);
00644             }
00645         }
00646     }
00647 
00648     PIZUNLOCK
00649     
00650     return err;
00651 }
00652 
00653 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00654 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00655 #pragma mark -
00656 
00657 PIZ_INLINE void pizSequenceUnselectNotes (PIZSequence *x)
00658 {
00659     long i;
00660     
00661     for (i = 0; i < pizGrowingArrayCount (x->map); i++) {   
00662         PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00663         PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00664         
00665         long p = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->map, i);
00666         
00667         pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (x->timeline[p], 0, (void **)&note);
00668         
00669         while (note) {
00670             pizLinklistNextByPtr (x->timeline[p], (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00671             note->isSelected = false;
00672             note = nextNote;
00673         }
00674     }
00675     
00676     x->markedNote = NULL;
00677 }
00678 
00679 PIZ_INLINE long pizSequenceSnapRound (PIZSequence *x, long toBeSnapped)
00680 {
00681     return MAX (((long)(((toBeSnapped / (double)x->grid) + 0.5)) * x->grid), 0);
00682 }
